DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety efficacy different dose investigational drug ( MK0518 ) therapy HIV-infected patient fail current antiretroviral therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Investigational Drug Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) -Infected Patients Failing Current Antiretroviral Therapies ( 0518-005 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient must HIV positive Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) Ribonucleic Acid ( RNA ) value within range require study Patient must currently antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) Patient le 18 year age Additional exclusion criterion discuss identify study doctor
